channel.title: Comments on: I’m In Istanbul
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Shaul
item.dc:creator: Shaul
item.description: Please bring me back a good falafel
item.content:encoded: Please bring me back a good falafel

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: I have the camera but I'm not so big on taking pictures. I'll probably post pictures tomorrow (Saturday) but I got 2 uploaded yesterday that may put a smile on your face: http://picasaweb.google.com/gnobal/Istanbul
item.content:encoded:
I have the camera but I’m not so big on taking pictures. I’ll probably post pictures tomorrow (Saturday) but I got 2 uploaded yesterday that may put a smile on your face:
http://picasaweb.google.com/gnobal/Istanbul

item.title: By: Doron Hirsch
item.dc:creator: Doron Hirsch
item.description: I hope you took your camera with you.
item.content:encoded: I hope you took your camera with you.
